translations: adj.私人的；不公开的；秘密参与的

sentences.sentence: She was not privy to any information contained in the letters.
sentences.translation: 她未获准接触那些信的内容。

sentences.sentence: Only three people, including a policeman, will be privy to the facts.
sentences.translation: 这些情况只会有三个人知道，其中包括一名警察。

sentences.sentence: I'm not privy to any pending announcement, so calm down.
sentences.translation: 我没有任何要想宣布的意思，所以请冷静。
